allow0ArcanaForAll.name: Allow all bugs to learn 0 Difficulty Arcana
allow0ArcanaForAll.hint: Disable this setting to restrict learning Arcana to only bugs who possess Mystic Ranks.

countLightWeight.name: Count Light objects' weight
countLightWeight.hint: If enabled, Light object counts as having 1/3 Bulk.
